data.message: Eminem, I believe that you are the person who is incomparable with anybody out there. You have been my guardian angel since 5 years and i am always grateful for that. You are the best father of all time, no doubt on that. You are my everything. You have been there thru all my times whether they were good or bad, doesn't matter but you have been always there.Scratching your lyrics give goosebumps to every stans. Your lyrics bulwark us with every cocksuckers out there. Thank you so much Eminem. We all are waiting desperately for your new album. Please drop it asap. Love from Nepal. I love you slim. ;) MARSHALL is all that Mathers ^^
